modName: SoS male bodymaps for slimmer bodies
summary: Just another replacement for male bodies ;)
descriptionHtml:
Description:
----------------
This mod will replace the Default bodymap (.msn texture) for all male actors in the game.
It is for use with slimmer bodymodels and Schlongs of Skyrim.
They are based on Fiszi's original bodytextures and meant to fix a texture missmatch problem as well as provide another bodyÂ 'shape' to chose from.


Recommended:
--------------------
Slimmer male Body for SoS: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58390]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58390[/url]


Install:
---------
Use the modmanager of your choice or extract the files manually into your Skyrim data Directory. Back up your old file, if you have any!


Uninstall:
-------------
Delete malebody_1_msn.dds from skyrim\data\textures\actors\character\male and replace it with your backed up file if you had any.


Credits:
----------
Fiszi for her great models and original textures. :)
My characters for being forced to show 'em off. :p
author: Kuschel-Drow
